description: Вертикальний японський слайд, що дихає, як памʼять
design_steps: 1. Background Generation — traditional washi texture, light tone
2. Text Layout — vertical only, one phrase per line, Mincho-style font
3. Safe Area Guidelines — top/bottom 10%, sides 8%, visible all glyphs
4. Export — PNG, high resolution, archive with text meta in JSON
style_notes: Шрифт Yu Mincho / Kozuka Mincho. По центру. Без скорочень.
use_case: Threads carousel / Instagram post / poetic archive
